name: Virat Kohli
description: Virat Kohli is one of the greatest batsmen in modern cricket and former captain of India.

name: Rohit Sharma
description: Rohit Sharma is known as the Hitman of Indian cricket and is famous for his explosive batting.

name: KL Rahul
description: KL Rahul is a versatile top-order batsman and wicketkeeper-batsman for India.

name: MS Dhoni
description: MS Dhoni is a legendary Indian captain and wicketkeeper-batsman, famous for finishing matches and his calm leadership.

name: Mitchell Starc
description: Mitchell Starc is a fast bowler known for deadly yorkers and pace.

name: Steve Smith
description: Steve Smith is an Australian batsman famous for his unorthodox technique and consistency.

name: Pat Cummins
description: Pat Cummins is a fast bowler and the Australian captain, known for his pace and consistency.

name: Ben Stokes
description: Ben Stokes is a world-class all-rounder for England known for match-winning performances.

name: Jofra Archer
description: Jofra Archer is a fast bowler known for his speed and deadly yorkers.

name: Kane Williamson
description: Kane Williamson is the captain of New Zealand and a technically brilliant batsman.

name: Trent Boult
description: Trent Boult is a left-arm fast bowler known for his swing and deadly spells.

name: Babar Azam
description: Babar Azam is the Pakistani captain and a top-order batsman known for consistency.

name: Shaheen Afridi
description: Shaheen Afridi is a young left-arm fast bowler for Pakistan known for his pace and swing.
